Fiber Optic Splicing Technician Job at Phillips Outsourcing Limited




        
    

        
        Phillips Outsourcing Limited - Our client in the telecommunications Industry is currently recruiting qualified candidates to fill the role below: 

Job Position: Fiber Optic Splicing Technician

Job Location: Ibadan
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Perform fusion splicing of optical fibers in ODFs, handholes, closures, and cabinets.
	Execute OTDR, power meter, and light source testing after splicing.
	Follow fiber jointing plans, splicing schedules, and color codes accurately.
	Install and organize fiber closures, splitters, pigtails, and splice trays.
	Ensure proper documentation of splice points, fiber routing, and test results.
	Troubleshoot and correct fiber signal loss or mismatches.
	Work closely with the splicing supervisor to meet daily targets.
	Maintain splicing tools and equipment in good condition
	Adhere to safety guidelines and quality standards during field operations.


Requirements


	Technical certificate or diploma in Telecommunications, Electronics, or related field.
	2+ years of experience in fiber optic splicing and testing, preferably in FTTH environments.
	Proficient with fusion splicers, OTDRs, power meters, and cleaning tools.
	Familiarity with fiber color codes, fiber routing, and splitter connections.
	Ability to work in outdoor OSP environments ( poles, chambers).
	Attention to detail and commitment to quality workmanship.
	Basic reporting and record-keeping skills.
